item.title: China and U.S. trade officials to hold talks in London
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's top trade officials are meeting with their Chinese counterparts in London on Monday for talks.

item.title: Trump announces U.S.-China trade talks in London
item.description: Trump had slapped higher tariffs on China than any other country, but temporarily lowered them last month after initial trade talks in Switzerland.

item.title: What to know about Trump's deployment of National Guard troops to L.A. protests
item.description: President Donald Trump says he's deploying 2,000 California National Guard troops to Los Angeles to respond to immigration protests.

item.title: Trump's new travel ban set to take effect amid escalating tension over immigration enforcement
item.description: President Donald Trump's new ban on travel to the U.S. by citizens from 12 mainly African and Middle Eastern countries is set to take effect Monday.

item.title: National Guard arrives in L.A. after Trump orders deployment to contain immigration protests
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom said that Trump was being "purposefully inflammatory" in sending National Guard troops to L.A.
